Halucigen turned to talk to Magmatron.  "As our sensors say," the 
part vulture went on to say" the might battle between the Maxiamls 
and the Decepticons is drawing thin, with casualties on both sides, 
if we struck now, our small numbers could win.  I ptepose that we 
strike while they are all weak,." he said.
